    Possible Errors

    Jenny Lee

    2021-12-26

    Intro_to_Errors.Rmd

    1. Common errors one may encounter..

    This document summarizes possible error one may encounter when using AclustsCCA

    # Load annotation file
data(annot) # row: CpG sites
# Load sample data
data(sample.data)
DATA.X <- sample.data$DATA.X # row: subjects (n), column: exposures (p)
DATA.Y <- sample.data$DATA.Y # row: subjects (n), column: CpG sites (q)

# Settings for Aclust
dist.type <- "spearman"
Aclust.method <- "average"
dist.thresh <- 0.2
bp.thresh.clust <- 1000
bp.merge <- 999

    2. Annotation file

    A preloaded annotation file should be and should include columns “IlmnID,” “CHR,” “Coordinate_37,” “Islands_Name,” “Relation_to_Island,” “UCSC_RefGene_Name.”

    data(annot)
#> Warning in data(annot): data set 'annot' not found
class(annot)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'annot' not found

# What if annotation file is data.frame? 
annot2 <- data.frame(annot)
#> Error in data.frame(annot): object 'annot' not found
class(annot2)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'annot2' not found
all.clusters.list <- Aclust::assign.to.clusters(betas = t(DATA.Y),
                                                annot = annot2,
                                                dist.type = dist.type,
                                                method = Aclust.method,
                                                dist.thresh = dist.thresh,
                                                bp.thresh.clust = bp.thresh.clust,
                                                bp.merge = bp.merge)
#> Error in order.betas.by.chrom.location(betas, annot = annot, annotation.file.name = annotation.file.name, : object 'annot2' not found

    An annotation file should be ordered by chromosome and chromosomal coordinates of the CpG.

    # What if annotation file is not ordered?
annot2 <- annot[sample(1:nrow(annot)),]
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'annot' not found
all.clusters.list <- Aclust::assign.to.clusters(betas = t(DATA.Y),
                                                annot = annot2,
                                                dist.type = dist.type,
                                                method = Aclust.method,
                                                dist.thresh = dist.thresh,
                                                bp.thresh.clust = bp.thresh.clust,
                                                bp.merge = bp.merge)
#> Error in order.betas.by.chrom.location(betas, annot = annot, annotation.file.name = annotation.file.name, : object 'annot2' not found
str(all.clusters.list)
#> Error in str(all.clusters.list): object 'all.clusters.list' not found
